attributes.action: Police to stop harassing people at car meets
attributes.additional_details: For years now police have harassed members of the car community who are simply socializing with other like minded individuals who share the same passion in cars we want this to stop, and stop being made out as anti social and treat like criminals in some circumstances for enjoying something we love
attributes.background:
Police not to linger around meets or intimidate car owners with there presence.

Stop car checks when there is no cause to.

Police to only attend if complaint is made from nearby residence etc 

To be stop being treat like criminals over a commonly shared passion

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational matter for local police forces.

You can find out how to complain about police conduct here:

https://www.policeconduct.gov.uk/complaints-reviews-and-appeals/make-complaint
